pkgmetadata.longdescription: Graphical User Interface (Shiny App) for Package 'brms' // A graphical user interface (GUI) for the package 'brms' which allows to fit Bayesian regression models using 'Stan' (https ://mc-stan.org/) (more specifically, using its R interface, the package 'rstan'). The 'shinybrms' GUI is a 'Shiny' (https://shiny.rstudio.com/) app, i.e. it was created using the package 'shiny'.
